properties.description: Pipeline to Integrate Data from ADLS to Synapse

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		PlaceOfServiceKey as integer,
		PlaceOfServiceEpicId as string,
		Name as string,
		DisplayName as string,
		Type as string,
		FacilityType as string,
		LocationCcn as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		Address as string,
		City as string,
		StateOrProvince as string,
		PostalCode as string,
		County as string,
		Country as string,
		EmailAddress as string,
		WebAddress as string,
		CreatedTimeStamp as timestamp,
		UpdatedTimeStamp as timestamp,
		MD5Hash as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT * FROM dbo.PlaceOfServiceDim',
	format: 'query',
	staged: false) ~> PlaceOfServiceDimReporting
source(output(
		PlaceOfServiceKey as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT MAX(PlaceOfServiceKey) AS PlaceOfServiceKey\nFROM dbo.PlaceOfServiceDim',
	format: 'query',
	staged: false) ~> MaxSurrogateKey
source(output(
		PlaceOfServiceKey as integer,
		Id as string,
		IdType as string,
		CreatedTimeStamp as timestamp,
		UpdatedTimeStamp as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT * FROM dbo.[PlaceOfServiceDim_IdLookup]',
	format: 'query',
	staged: false) ~> PlaceOfServiceDimIdLookUp
source(output(
		Id as string,
		IdType as string,
		PlaceOfServiceEpicId as string,
		Name as string,
		DisplayName as string,
		Type as string,
		FacilityType as string,
		LocationCcn as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		Address as string,
		City as string,
		StateOrProvince as string,
		PostalCode as string,
		County as string,
		Country as string,
		EmailAddress as string,
		WebAddress as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> SourcePlaceOfService
SourcePlaceOfService, PlaceOfServiceDimIdLookUp exists(SourcePlaceOfService@Id == PlaceOfServiceDimIdLookUp@Id
	&& SourcePlaceOfService@IdType == PlaceOfServiceDimIdLookUp@IdType,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> IdIdTypeDoesNotExists
IdIdTypeDoesNotExists derive(CDCValue = ERROR_FUNCTION('=md5(Name, DisplayName, Type, FacilityType, LocationCcn, PhoneNumber, Address, City, StateOrProvince, PostalCode, County, Country, EmailAddress, WebAddress)')) ~> CDCValue
